title: Why Are We Interested in What We Are?
description:
This is the first solo video I've made in over 1.5 months (almost 2 months, actually) and so I wanted to talk about that--only I attempted to do so in a more abstract way. Some of the things I was mumbling about here are really fascinating to me so far as it concerns flow states, meaning, and personal interests. 

Sorry about not publishing/recording this yesterday or the day before. Hopefully, I'll be able to get back on track. Looks like, though, that next week will be a dead week because I will be out of town. 

This is episode 71 of my podcast.

My Writing: https://coltonkirby.substack.com/

There is an audio version of my videos (on all podcast platforms): https://anchor.fm/coltonkirby

About Me: https://coltonkirby.substack.com/about?utm_source=menu-dropdown
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/coltonjkirby/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/_coltonkirby
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/officialcoltonkirby/
Odysee: https://odysee.com/@ColtonKirby
